comment.author: 55597723@N02
comment._content: Nice classic photo. Handsome & Honorable Gentlemen. From the way they are dressed- Looks to me like they were good Bread winners at their occupation - - -

comment.author: 7386640@N02
comment._content: Gold Star Award - Level 1 You are invited to add this exceptional image to GOLD STAR AWARD

comment.author: 47044499@N03
comment._content: Is one of these gentlemen linked to Synnotts' (Sinnotts) Hotel at Rosslare Co. Wexford? I remember the hotel from my young days on holiday there in the 1950's.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/47044499@N03] Unfortunately, we don't know! Synnott / Sinnott seems to have been a relatively common name around Wexford, but who knows?
